summary: Experienced Civil Engineer/Quantity Surveyor with demonstrated history of working in the construction industry. Skilled in Quantity Surveying, Value Engineering, Cost Management and Project Estimation (Tender and Project). Strong operations professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Civil Engineering from Don Honorio Ventura Technological State University.

school.name: Don Honorio Ventura Technological State University

profile_positions.description:
Duties & Responsibilities;
•	Perform tender costing and estimates
•	Attends Tender Interview and meeting 
•	Monitor awarded project 
•	Measure the as-built works progressively
•	Assess variation orders, prepare interim valuations, cost plan and budget studies
•	Verify progress claim submitted by subcontractors/suppliers and prepare payment responses
•	Liaise with consultant QS on progress payments and variation orders
•	Estimate subcontractor’s final cost 
•	Attend onsite and consultant’s meeting and liaise with clients, architects and consultant in administration of the project
•	Interpret engineering drawings and specifications to calculate project costs
profile_positions.title: Quantity Surveyor

profile_positions.description:
Duties & Responsibilities;

•	Prepares Detailed Breakdown of Quantities
•	Provide advice on all contractual matters to the Managers and assist in settling contractual disputes
•	Assist the Project Manager in submitting all the required contractual documentations required in the Contracts 
•	Advise and assist the Project Manager on the preparation of all the documentation required for the claims for the monthly progress payments
•	Monitor and manage project activities during each phase of the project life cycle
•	Work with the consultants and document project activities related to all works
•	Assist the Project Manager in the preparation of WBS and Project Plan/Schedule
•	Assist the Project Manager in the monitoring of the project activities
•	Review and assess the progress on site and assess monthly progress claims submitted by the sub-contractor and provide recommendation to the Managers
•	Prepares all the necessary documentation for the submission of the Monthly Progress payment claims to the Clients/Consultant for approval
•	Prepares and maintain the payment schedules of the sub-contractor
•	Prepares the finalization of accounts with the contractors
•	Create status reports for the Project Managers and the Clients
•	Tender Proposed Projects
profile_positions.title: Quantity Surveyor

profile_positions.description:
Duties & Responsibilities;

•	Prepares Project Management Office Weekly, Monthly and Annual Reports
•	Quantity take off/estimate of structure of the projects e.g viaducts, bridges, buildings, stations and depot.
•	Site inspection and site coordination
•	Assist the Sr. Construction Manager in preparation of day to day accomplishment reports
•	Review and comment on reports submitted by the contractor and consultant
•	Provide support services to the other functional groups and departments
•	Act as a coordinator of the Construction Group
•	Maintain complete records of Construction plans
•	Related CAD Works
•	Maintain a variety of records and plans and files on assigned work
•	Perform other functions that may be assign from time to time e.g prepares correspondence/letter, memorandum, take minutes of the meeting of Construction Meeting and other related functions.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Civil Engineer

company.name: St. Catherine Realty and Development Corporation

profile_positions.company: St. Catherine Realty and Development Corporation
profile_positions.description:
Duties & Responsibilities;

•	Quantities take off/preparation of detailed estimate of various projects e.g. houses (residential and model houses), clubhouse, entrance gate, roads, drainage, commercial buildings and others.
•	CAD Detailer 
•	In charge of the documents for the Building Permit and Construction Permit
•	In charge in application of Building Permits
•	Conduct Field Density Test ( FDT Test) for Sub-Base and Base-Course
•	Inspect Contractor’s accomplishment
•	Verify billing statements submitted by contractors 
•	In charge of Material control of Projects
•	Prepares Job order forms / requirements for approval
•	Oversees the construction and operation of Civil Engineering projects such as Construction of Model Houses, Entrance Gates, Clubhouse, Roads and Drainage, Retaining Walls, Rip –rap and others.
profile_positions.title: Quantity Surveyor / Estimator, Office Engineer
